cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on June 29, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3787, District of Columbia Local Juror Non-Discrimination Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 99 (Tuesday, June 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 3787.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 17 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H2702]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: District of Columbia Local Juror Non-Discrimination Act of 2021
